channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: Discover how Blessed Carlo Acutis followed Christ with bold originality?and inspired the world to do the same. His mother, Antonia Salzano, shares how her son?s faith led her back to God. Postulator Nicola Gori reflects on Carlo?s deep love for the Eucharist and his mission to bring the Gospel online. From the hospital where he offered his final suffering, to the young people now living out his legacy?this is the story of a modern saint who showed the youth of today a clear and joyful path to holiness. (30 minutes).
